content: **knitted wrist warmers in drops fiesta piece is knitted bottom up in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #colorwhirlcuffs drops design pattern fs-026 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits wrist with circumference approx 15-16-17 cm measurements length approx 24-25-26 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 29 garden party **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
